name: typeblade
description: A dynamic, rhythm-sensitive typing-practice web app built with React + Phaser.js

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:api" "supabase start"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:api
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules api/node_modules frontend/dist api/dist
